author: bhuvaneswari01
body:
How to get credentials from task scheduler in powershell?

The main requirement we should not keep the credentials in scripting . whenever script is running credentials are automatically taken from task scheduler. Like that i need the scipt.

Is there any possibility in task scheduler or powershell?

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @bhuvaneswari01 It's better to post your question to stackoverflow, or use the [Discussion](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/discussions) tab instead.

title: How to get credentials from task scheduler in powershell
